content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (10, 2), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 1: 初期配置は自軍空母が(10,2)、敵空母は(26,26)付近。距離約34ヘクス。航空部隊の作戦行動半径は22ヘクスなので、現在位置からは敵空母に到達不可能。まず索敵を開始し、敵空母の正確な位置を特定する必要がある。作戦方針：(1)空母を南東方向へ移動させ、敵空母への距離を詰める。(2)航空部隊を最大射程で南東方向へ発艦させ、広範囲を索敵。目標は(26,26)付近だが、まずASQ1を(28,20)へ、ASQ2を(24,24)へ発艦させ、異なる経路で索敵範囲を広げる。空母は(16,10)方向へ移動開始。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 10}, "launch_target": {"x": 28, "y": 20}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=16 y=10 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=15 y=10.
launch_target was rejected. x=28 y=20 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=24 y=17.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 1修正: 空母の目標地点(16,10)は陸地だった。(15,10)は海上なのでそちらへ変更。航空部隊の発艦目標(28,20)は射程外。現在位置(10,2)から距離22以内に制限される。(24,17)が推奨座標。ASQ1を(24,17)へ発艦させ南東方向を索敵。ASQ2は次ターン以降に別方向へ発艦させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 10}, "launch_target": {"x": 24, "y": 17}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (24, 17) while at (11, 5).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (11, 4), en route to target (15, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (11, 5), outbound toward (24, 17), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 2: ASQ1は(11,5)から(24,17)へ向けて飛行中。空母は(11,4)から(15,10)へ移動中。ASQ2をまだ発艦させていない。敵空母は(26,26)付近と推定されるため、ASQ2を別の索敵経路で発艦させる。現在空母位置(11,4)から射程22以内で、より南方向を索敵するため(20,24)を目標に設定。これにより2機で異なる経路から敵空母の位置を探索できる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 20, "y": 24}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (18, 10) while at (13, 9).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (20, 24) while at (13, 6).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (18, 10) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (12, 5), en route to target (15, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (13, 9), outbound toward (24, 17), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (13, 6), outbound toward (20, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 3: 重要な発見！ASQ1が(13,9)で敵航空部隊BSQ1を(18,10)で発見。敵機の位置から敵空母の位置を推定できる。敵機が(18,10)にいるということは、敵空母はそこから射程22以内、かつ発艦地点にいるはず。敵機の進行方向を考えると、敵空母は南東方向(26,26)付近から北西方向へ索敵に来ている可能性が高い。つまり敵空母は(26,26)付近ではなく、もっと北西寄り、おそらく(22,18)から(28,22)の範囲にいる可能性。ASQ1は(24,17)へ継続、ASQ2は(20,24)へ継続し索敵を続行。空母は(15,10)へ継続移動し、次の航空部隊発艦に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 8) while at (14, 6).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 8) while at (16, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 8) while at (15, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 8) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (14, 6), en route to target (15, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (16, 11), outbound toward (24, 17), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (15, 10), outbound toward (20, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 4: 危機的状況！敵航空部隊BSQ1が(15,8)まで接近し、空母AC1(14,6)のすぐ近くにいる。敵機は(18,10)→(15,8)と北西方向へ移動しており、明らかに我が空母を索敵・攻撃しようとしている。敵機の移動ベクトルから逆算すると、敵空母は南東方向、おそらく(26,20)から(30,26)の範囲にいると推定。空母は即座に回避行動が必要。敵機の進行方向(北西)から逃れるため、北東方向へ移動。目標を(20,4)に変更し敵機から離脱。ASQ1は(24,17)継続、ASQ2は(20,24)継続で敵空母索敵を優先。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 4}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (14, 7) while at (17, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (13, 7) while at (16, 12).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 7) while at (16, 6).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (19, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (17, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 14) (previously at (21, 14)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (16, 6), en route to target (20, 4), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (19, 13), outbound toward (21, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (17, 13), outbound toward (21, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 5: 大勝利！ASQ1とASQ2が敵空母BC1を(21,14)で発見！両航空部隊は自動的に攻撃目標を敵空母に変更した。敵空母は予想より北西寄りの(21,14)にいた。現在ASQ1は(19,13)、ASQ2は(17,13)から敵空母(21,14)へ向かっている。次ターンには攻撃可能。敵航空部隊BSQ1は(15,7)で我が空母を追跡中だが、空母は(16,6)から(20,4)へ回避中。敵機との距離を保ちつつ、我が航空部隊による敵空母攻撃を優先。空母は引き続き(20,4)へ移動し敵機から離脱。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ1) while at (16, 6).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ1) causing 21 damage while at (16, 6).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (20, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 13).

- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 14) (previously at (21, 14)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (16, 6), en route to target (20, 4), HP 79/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (20, 15), engaging an enemy target at (21, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 13), engaging an enemy target at (21, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 6: 戦況分析：(1)我が空母AC1が敵航空部隊BSQ1に対空攻撃し21ダメージを与えた(HP22/40に減少)。しかし我が空母もHP79/100に被弾。(2)ASQ1とASQ2が敵空母BC1(21,14)を攻撃中。両機とも(20,15)と(20,13)から攻撃態勢。次ターンで敵空母に大ダメージを与えられる見込み。(3)空母は(16,6)から(20,4)へ移動中。敵航空部隊BSQ1(HP22/40)はまだ脅威だが、対空砲火で撃墜寸前。作戦継続：空母は(20,4)へ移動継続し敵機から離脱。航空部隊は敵空母攻撃を継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ1) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 20 damage while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 14 damage while at (20, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (20, 13).

- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 11) while at (20, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 11) while at (20, 13).

- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 14) (previously at (21, 14)), HP 41/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (17, 11) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (17, 5), en route to target (20, 4), HP 79/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (20, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 20/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 7: 大成功！ASQ1が敵空母BC1に20ダメージ、ASQ2が14ダメージを与え、敵空母はHP41/100に。両航空部隊は帰還中。しかし我が航空部隊も被弾：ASQ1はHP20/40、ASQ2はHP26/40。敵航空部隊BSQ1(HP22/40)が(17,11)にいて、我が空母(17,5)に接近中。空母は(17,5)から(20,4)へ移動中だが、敵機が追跡している。敵空母はHP41/100で大ダメージを受けているが、まだ撃沈していない。次の攻撃波が必要。空母は敵機から離脱するため東方向へ移動継続。帰還中の航空部隊を収容後、再発艦させて敵空母にとどめを刺す。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (18, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (20, 14) while at (18, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 14) while at (18, 9).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (20, 14) while at (18, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 14) (previously at (21, 14)), HP 41/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (20, 14) (previously at (18, 10)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (19, 5), en route to target (20, 4), HP 79/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (18, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 20/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (18, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 8: 帰還中の航空部隊が敵空母BC1(21,14)と敵航空部隊BSQ1(20,14)を再発見。敵機BSQ1は(17,11)→(20,14)と南東方向へ移動しており、我が空母から離れて自軍空母へ帰還中と推測。敵空母はHP41/100で静止中。我が空母は(19,5)で(20,4)へ到着間近。ASQ1(HP20/40)とASQ2(HP26/40)は帰還中で(18,11)と(18,9)。空母との距離は約6-7ヘクス。数ターン後に着艦可能。敵空母を撃沈するには再攻撃が必要だが、航空部隊のHPが低い。しかし敵空母HP41なので、1-2回の攻撃で撃沈可能。空母は(20,4)到着後、南方向へ移動し敵空母への距離を詰め、航空部隊収容後すぐ再発艦させる準備。目標(18,10)へ変更し南下開始。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 10}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=18 y=10 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=19 y=10.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "Turn 8修正: 目標座標(18,10)は陸地だった。(19,10)は海上なので修正。空母を南下させて敵空母への距離を詰め、航空部隊収容後に再発艦させる準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 10}, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "Turn 9: ASQ2が空母に着艦成功(HP26/40)。ASQ1は(18,7)で帰還中、次ターンに着艦予定。敵空母BC1は(21,14)でHP41/100。敵航空部隊BSQ1は視界から消えたが、おそらく敵空母へ帰還中。空母は(19,6)から(19,10)へ移動中。敵空母との距離は約8ヘクス。ASQ1が着艦次第、両航空部隊を再発艦させて敵空母にとどめを刺す。ASQ2はHP26/40で即座に発艦可能だが、ASQ1(HP20/40)の着艦を待って同時攻撃した方が効果的。空母は(19,10)へ継続移動。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "Turn 13: ASQ1が敵空母BC1に7ダメージを与え、敵空母はHP31/100に。ASQ1は被弾してHP13/40となり帰還中。ASQ2が(21,13)から敵空母(21,14)を攻撃中。次ターンでASQ2が攻撃すれば敵空母HP31に大ダメージを与えられる。敵航空部隊BSQ1(HP5/40)が(21,12)にいるが、ほぼ無力化状態。空母は(22,8)から(24,8)へ移動中。ASQ2の攻撃で敵空母を撃沈できる可能性が高い。作戦継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}
